title: Rangnick: I don't know if Ronaldo's happy | Rashford can decide future in summer
shortDescription: Cristiano Ronaldo, Edinson Cavani and Raphael Varane will be available for Manchester United's Premier League clash with Tottenham on Saturday, live on Sky Sports.

title: Papers: Man City have deal in place to sign Haaland
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Saturday's national newspapers...

title: Chelsea's credit cards temporarily suspended by Barclays
shortDescription: Chelsea's club credit cards have been temporarily suspended by Barclays in the wake of Roman Abramovich being sanctioned by the UK government.

title: Conte: A good vision gives hope for Tottenham success
shortDescription: Antonio Conte says he and Tottenham will "find the best solution for both" at the end of the season over his future at the club.

title: West Brom 2-2 Huddersfield
shortDescription: Highlights of the Sky Bet Championship match between West Bromwich Albion and Huddersfield Town.

title: West Brom keep promotion hopes alive with gripping draw vs Huddersfield
shortDescription: West Brom signalled there is still life in their bid for promotion from the Sky Bet Championship as they staged a late fightback to hold Huddersfield to a 2-2 draw.

title: Back 6/1 weekend treble  - Jones Knows
shortDescription: Our tipster Jones Knows, who is 73.5 points in profit for the season, has his two best bets to attack this weekend across an exciting batch of Premier League fixtures.

title: PL Predictions: Liverpool to suffer title hiccup at Brighton
shortDescription: Let our tipster Jones Knows guide your through a busy Premier League weekend with his array of insight, analysis, tips and predictions.

title: Johnstone's big blunder for Baggies
shortDescription: West Brom goalkeeper Sam Johnstone had a moment to forget as his clearance struck Danny Ward and deflected into the net to give Huddersfield a 1-0 lead.

title: Batlle on 'hard' Manchester move and Champions League dream
shortDescription: Manchester United Ona Batlle told Sky Sports how she has never been happier to be away from the Spanish sun and her dreams for the club this season.

title: Kudela drops appeal against ban for racist abuse of Kamara; 'I'm so sorry'
shortDescription:
Slavia Prague defender Ondrej Kudela has dropped his appeal against a 10-match
ban for racially abusing Rangers midfielder Glen Kamara and said: "I'm so sorry."

title: WSL preview: Man Utd travel to Reading live on Sky Sports
shortDescription: Team news and stats for Saturday's Women's Super League fixtures as Reading host Manchester United, live on Sky Sports, while Leicester travel to Everton.

title: Trincao: 'I'm doing great things at Wolves - I deserve more'
shortDescription: In an exclusive interview with Sky Sports, Wolves winger Francisco Trincao - who is on loan from Barcelona - discusses why he should be playing more at Molineux.

title: Subscribe to the Essential Football Podcast
shortDescription: Listen to the latest episode and subscribe to the Essential Football Podcast from Sky Sports Football.

title: Lloris: Calmness required in Conte revolution
shortDescription: Hugo Lloris tells Sky Sports why calmness is required - inside and outside of the club - with Antonio Conte's revolution at Tottenham Hotspur.

title: Chelsea Podcast and Q&A: Tuchel's future and potential buyers
shortDescription: Kaveh Solhekol joined The Essential Football Podcast to answer all the important questions after the UK Government sanctioned Chelsea owner Roman Abramovich.

title: Van Bronckhorst: No extra motivation needed in Scottish Cup
shortDescription: Rangers manager Giovanni van Bronckhorst is certain his players will be fully focused on a Scottish Cup victory over Dundee this weekend.

title: Tuchel: Hard to focus on football | We are privileged
shortDescription: Chelsea boss Thomas Tuchel says it is "hard to focus only on football" amid Russia's invasion of Ukraine and feels "very privileged" to be a Premier League coach.

title: Premier League previews: Man Utd vs Spurs live on Sky & more
shortDescription: Team news, stats, predictions and how to follow the Premier League on Saturday as Manchester United host Tottenham, live on Sky Sports.

title: Klopp: I feel for Tuchel and Chelsea | Lampard expresses sympathy for fans
shortDescription: Jurgen Klopp has backed the government's decision to sanction Chelsea owner Roman Abramovich, but admits he feels sorry for the club and Thomas Tuchel.
